text: 6.23 Stt 2.17, Lom 2.7, 5.12, 5.15, Jem 1.15, 1 Pi 1.4 Nɨŋɨd apun, tap si tap tɨmel gep ak bɨ wog gɨñeb ne okok kɨlop tawup. Pen tawup anɨb ak, kumeb bad ak. God pen tap tep chɨnop monmon ñɨnɨgab ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, chɨn pel pelnep yonɨgabun. Bɨawl chɨn Klays Jisas yɨl mɨdɨl, pel pelnep yonɨgabun.
